name: Truth Seeking (DEMO)
description:
It's a murder mystery! Why was Miss Juniper Sato murdered, and who did it? Detective Alex (last name TBD) must question people in town to find the truth, and hopefully catch the culprit. THIS IS A DEMO. There is only 1 ending atm. There is a 90% chance this game will be finished, but I would feel better if there would be at least a couple people interested in this. This is also my first game, so it'll probably be predictable.

No warnings for now, but if this is finished, there will be a warning for blood!

Criticism greatly appreciated. All art, music, story,and coding by Rubenzo (me) 

Game should be playable on Windows, Linux, and Mac,  but there's a possibility it might not work on Mac or Linux, sorry!
